claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).

rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote identifies Flublok as the recombinant influenza vaccine (RIV4) being discussed in the study, which is necessary to link subsequent technical descriptions of RIV4 to Flublok specifically.
